PriceBookRateCard.name: PriceBookRateCard
PriceBookRateCard.description: Represents a junction between price book and rate card objects.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Auto-generated identifier for the price book rate card record.

PriceBookId.description: Price book ID that's associated with the rate cards IDs. For Quote, Order, and Contracts, the price book IDs identify the associated rate cards.

RateCardId.description: Rate card ID that's associated with the price book.

RateCardType.description: Type of rate card associated with the price book.
